self_predictions.prediction_summary: Vitalii believes he can beat Michael Todd in one motion with a flash pin, but acknowledges it might be difficult if Michael stops him.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Michael Todd is seen as a more problematic opponent due to his stopping ability.

Michael Todd.previous_match_summary: Michael always stops opponents but has lost some supermatches.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Vitalii thinks Devon is less difficult than Michael and believes he can beat Devon even if he's not at full strength after fighting Michael.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Devon's outsmarting tactics are a concern, but Vitalii is confident in his ability to win.

Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon is respected but seen as different at the table, in conferences, and in real life.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Vitalii thinks Dave can hold Tsvetkov if he's in the same form as when they fought.

Dave Chaffee.previous_match_summary: Dave is a strong opponent who deserved his round win against Vitalii.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Vitalii believes Devon will outsmart Corey with referees favoring him.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Devon's tactics and referee leniency are seen as advantages.

Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon is known for outsmarting opponents.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Vitalii thinks John will win by taking Yoshinobu's pass and not letting him arm wrestle.

Yoshinobu Kanai.previous_match_summary: Yoshinobu was close to winning against Todd Hutchings.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Vitalii thinks Ermes was in better shape when they fought and now it will be harder for him against Levan.

Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Levan is the dominant super heavyweight champion.

Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Ermes was stronger against Michael than against Vitalii.
